description: A set of questions to test the software with
name: Loadmaster Airdrop (May 18)

questions.question: 101. If ADS Rail Locks are _____ before lock force pounds are set, false/inaccurate force pounds settings may result.
102. The Depressurization Checklist will be run prior to the _____.
103. Accomplish the Cabin Altitude Checklist before _____.
responses: exceeding a cabin altitude of 10,000 feet MSL
exceeding a cabin altitude of 12,5000 feet MSL.

questions.question: 104. If the drogue chute does not deploy automatically or with the manual backup switch, the loadmaster will state _____ and complete the Heavy Equipment Malfunction Checklist.

105. If the Tow Release Mechanism fails to release the extraction link (either automatically or with the manual backup switch), the loadmaster will state, “MALFUNCTION” and activate the DROGUE JETTISON switch. If the drogue fails to jettison, the loadmaster will _____.
responses: activate the EMERG DROGUE Jettison switch
activate the R LOCKS GANG RELEASE switch
place the DROGUE JETTISON switch to the OFF position

questions.question: 106. If the extraction parachutes have exited the aircraft and the platform fails to move, ensure the _____ rotary switch is set to the lowest lock number setting that is engaged in the platform	 	 that failed to move and activate the _____.
responses: CDS GATE SELECT; ADS BACKUP CDS Switch
DROP GP SELECT; R LOCKS GANG RELEASE switch
ADS R LOCK SELECT; R LOCKS GANG RELEASE switch
ADS L LOCK SELECT; L LOCKS GANG RELEASE switch

questions.question: 107. The C -17 has the capability to airdrop a total of _____ pounds using multiple Type V airdrop platforms with the EFTC.
108. The maximum dimensions of airdrop loads are _____ inches high measured from the bottom of the platform	 and _____ inches wide.

109. When additional personnel airdrops are conducted after the initial airdrop sorti e, loadmasters shall reinspect the troop doors before takeoff IAW the Personnel Airdrop Preparation and Loading Checklist. For subsequent personnel airdrops, a tactile -only check is required between drops.
110. During a towed parachutist condition, the PF will _____ as the parachutist may start swinging violently, which will increase the possibility of injury.
responses: avoid turning the aircraft in the direction of the towed parachutist
turn the aircraft in the direction of the towed parachutist

questions.question: 111. During a towed parachutist condition, if the decision to cut t he parachutist free, the _____ will cut the static line on the aircraft commander ’s command.
112. During Fouled Parachutist Retrieval do not attempt to pull the _____ through the spool assembly.
113. During the CDS Airdrop Slowdown Checklist, visually inspect each Type XXVI nylon release gate to ensure it is positioned on the GRM release roller and _____.
responses: that all the excess webbing folded and taped
the looped end overlaps the release arm hinge joint
has not become tangled or caught on the release arm hinge joint
the Van Zelm ratchets are tightened to the maximum extent possible

questions.question: 114. If the GRM(s) fail to release or the load stops moving aft, the loadmaster will state _____.
responses: "NO DROP" and attempt to secure any loose containers
"LOAD CLEAR" after all containers that are moving have exited
"MALFUNCTION" and attempt to secure any moving containers
"MALFUNCTION" after all containers that are moving have exited

questions.question: 115. Loadmasters requiring mobility in the cargo compartment while using a restraint harness can be unattached as long as they remain forward of _____ with the cargo door and ramp open or with the	_____ paratroop door(s) open.

116. For static line jumps, static lines are attached to anchor cables before troop door(s) are opened. Jumpers exiting on subsequent passes may stand and hook up with door(s) opened if they are forward of _____.
117. When in-flight rigging is required, the loadmaster will use the applicable _____ as a checklist to ensure all items are completed.
118. A "No Drop" will be called if Slowdown or Quick Drop checklist items are not completed prior to the initiation of the _____.
119. Loadmasters may attempt to regain ADS logic up to initiation of the _____ checklist.

120. When preflighting the retriever winch cable for personnel airdrops, up to _____ broken wires are allowed per inch . The maximum number of broken wires shall not occur in any two consecutive inches of cable.

121. In the event that a lock is engaged in a platform and the second lock on the same panel is engaged between, adjacent or aft of the platform, use the INC/DECR toggle switch and decrease the setting _____.
responses: one increment below the required restraint
to 00 for a minimum of 2 seconds

questions.question: 122. The required number of left hand locks engaged in each platform must be equal to or greater than the number of right hand locks engaged in that platform.
